homepage.title: Find your workshop easily
homepage.subtitle: Upload your inspection report and get offers from verified workshops in your area. Compare prices, times and reviews - all in one place.

how_it_works.title: It's that simple
how_it_works.subtitle: Three easy steps to your new workshop

step1.title: Upload report
step1.description: Upload your inspection report (JPG, PNG or PDF) and tell us what needs to be fixed.

step2.title: Get offers
step2.description: Verified workshops in your area send offers with prices and times.

step3.title: Book and pay
step3.description: Choose the best offer, book a time and pay securely via Klarna.

verified.title: Verified workshops
verified.description: All workshops are checked and have valid certificates.

fast.title: Fast offers
fast.description: Get offers within 24 hours from workshops in your area.

transparent.title: Transparent prices
transparent.description: Compare prices, times and reviews before you decide.

secure.title: Secure payment
secure.description: Pay securely via Klarna with all their payment options.

cta.title: Ready to find your workshop?
cta.subtitle: Upload your inspection report and get offers today

upload.title: Upload your inspection report
upload.subtitle: Step 1 of 3 - Upload your report and tell us about your car

file_upload.title: Upload files
file_upload.description: Upload your inspection report (JPG, PNG or PDF). Max 5 files, 10MB per file.
file_upload.drag_drop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select

vehicle_info.title: Vehicle information
vehicle_info.description: Tell us about your car so workshops can give you better offers

description.title: Description
description.description: Describe what needs to be fixed or if you have any special requests
description.placeholder: Describe what needs to be fixed on your car...

my_cases.title: My cases
my_cases.subtitle: Here you can see all your requests and their status

no_cases.title: No cases yet
no_cases.description: You haven't sent any requests yet. Start by uploading your inspection report.

booking_form.title: Complete Booking
booking_form.policy_text: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the appointment. After that, rescheduling may be available.

my_cases.title: My cases

no_cases.title: No cases yet
no_cases.description: You haven't sent any requests yet. Start by uploading your inspection report.

errors.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters

errors.registration_failed: Something went wrong with the registration. Please try again.
